summary: Highly skilled .NET Developer with 6+ years of experience leveraging Agile and Waterfall methodologies to deliver efficient and collaborative projects. Proven ability to effectively communicate with clients, navigate complex requirements, and perform under pressure. Expertise in web application development using .NET Framework/Core, TypeScript, and related technologies. Strong problem-solving skills and stress resilience.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.project: Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) Platform for K-12 Education
experience.description: A multi-tenant, cloud-based ERP platform designed for the K-12 education sector. The system integrates modules for student information management, financial administration, HR, and payroll to streamline district-wide operations and reporting.

experience.title: Infrastructure Team Lead
experience.description: Developed features for an industry-leading point-of-sale system designed to drive sales growth through enhanced guest spending, including customizable user interfaces, upsell workflows, transaction handling, and integration of solutions for game floor, sales, and customer management.
responsibilities: Environment setup, script/package installation, and deployment
Spearheaded development of a new virtual environment using Hyper-V and Docker

experience.title: Full-stack .Net Developer
experience.description: Developed and maintained a system with multiple microservices for aggregation and sale of telecommunication services as bundles for a company with over 40,000 employees across nine countries, including the UK and Ireland.

experience.title: Full-stack .Net Developer
experience.description: Contributed to the development of a leading cloud-based document management service that provides secure creation, editing, storage, and collaboration on documents/emails across devices.
responsibilities: Estimation, prioritization, and distribution of tasks
